title: Youth Should be Early
overview: At the graduation ceremony, Cheng Xin proposes to his boyfriend Zheng Gong, but he unexpectedly rejects the offer. While Cheng Xin continues to work in his family's corporation, Zheng Gan has difficulty finding a job. Cheng Xin secretly helps him get an interview without his knowledge. But when the truth comes out, not only does he lose his job and reputation in this field, but the relationship between him and Cheng Xin is destroyed. Will Zheng Gan be able to get back on his feet and believe in love again?
